member.name: T:Hyper.NodeServices.Contracts.SystemCommands.SystemCommandName
member.summary: Enumerates the names of built-in system command modules.

member.name: F:Hyper.NodeServices.Contracts.SystemCommands.SystemCommandName.Discover
member.summary: Retrieves the names of all instances that are descendants of the intended recipient. type: No request type is required for this command module. type: A containing the descendants of the intended recipient.

member.name: F:Hyper.NodeServices.Contracts.SystemCommands.SystemCommandName.GetCachedTaskProgressInfo
member.summary: Retrieves cached task progress information for the task with the ID specified in the command request string. type: A containing the ID of the task for which to retrieve cached progress info. type: A containing the cached task progress info if the cache is enabled. Otherwise, returns a warning indicating that the cache is disabled.

member.name: F:Hyper.NodeServices.Contracts.SystemCommands.SystemCommandName.GetChildNodes
member.summary: Retrieves the names of all instances that are immediate children of the intended recipient. type: No request type is required for this command module. type: A containing the immediate children of the intended recipient.

member.name: F:Hyper.NodeServices.Contracts.SystemCommands.SystemCommandName.GetNodeStatus
member.summary: Retrieves the status of the . type: No request type is required for this command module. type: A containing a status summary of the intended recipient, including lists of active tasks, commands, and custom activity monitors as well as the current settings for the .

member.name: F:Hyper.NodeServices.Contracts.SystemCommands.SystemCommandName.Echo
member.summary: Echoes the request string back to the caller. This command is useful for checking connectivity and command request/response passthrough. type: A containing the string to echo back to the caller. type: A containing a slightly modified version of the request string.

member.name: F:Hyper.NodeServices.Contracts.SystemCommands.SystemCommandName.EnableCommand
member.summary: Enables or disables the command module with the name specified in the request object. type: An containing the command name and whether to enable or disable it. type: A indicating success or failure.

member.name: F:Hyper.NodeServices.Contracts.SystemCommands.SystemCommandName.EnableActivityMonitor
member.summary: Enables or disables the custom activity monitor with the name specified in the request object. type: An containing the monitor name and whether to enable or disable it. type: A indicating success or failure.

member.name: F:Hyper.NodeServices.Contracts.SystemCommands.SystemCommandName.RenameActivityMonitor
member.summary: Renames the custom activity monitor with the name specified in the request object. type: A containing the old name and the new name of the custom activity monitor. type: A indicating success or failure.

member.name: F:Hyper.NodeServices.Contracts.SystemCommands.SystemCommandName.EnableTaskProgressCache
member.summary: Enables or disables the task progress cache. type: An indicating whether or enable or disable the task progress cache. type: A indicating success or failure.

member.name: F:Hyper.NodeServices.Contracts.SystemCommands.SystemCommandName.EnableDiagnostics
member.summary: Enables or disables diagnostics. type: An indicating whether or enable or disable diagnostics. type: A indicating success or failure.

member.name: F:Hyper.NodeServices.Contracts.SystemCommands.SystemCommandName.CancelTask
member.summary: Cancels the task with the ID specified in the command request string. type: A containing the ID of the task to cancel. type: A indicating success or failure.

member.name: F:Hyper.NodeServices.Contracts.SystemCommands.SystemCommandName.SetTaskProgressCacheDuration
member.summary: Sets the sliding expiration time for items in the task progress cache. type: A specifying how long the duration should be. type: A indicating success or failure. A flag is returned indicating whether the cache is enabled.

member.summary: Tests whether the specified command name is a system command.
